DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance safety Tympanostomy Tube Delivery System ( TTDS ) chronic otitis medium recurrent acute otitis medium .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed either chronic otitis medium effusion acute otitis medium schedule undergo tympanostomy tube insertion Reaction anesthesia Markedly atrophic , bimeric , severely retract , atelectatic perforate tympanic membrane Otitis externa Active acute otitis medium Otitis medium pathology require Ttubes Stenosed ear canal Anatomy preclude visualization access tympanic membrane Anatomy necessitate tympanostomy tube placement posterior half membrane
